MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH66 postcode area of Little Sutton affecting properties in  Cedar Avenue, Maple Avenue and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:43AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse  and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:21PM on 2nd December 2020
